20101221191541.000|20101221191541.000|CC1|SERIOUS.

20101221193613.000|20101221193615.000|CC1|AND, MARK, THIS IS INTERESTING,

20101221193626.000|20101221193627.000|CC1|HAS, AND THE CENSUS TELLS US A  
20101221193627.000|20101221193628.000|CC1|LOT MORE.                       
20101221193628.000|20101221193629.000|CC1|>> Reporter: RIGHT, THERE'S THIS
20101221193629.000|20101221193631.000|CC1|MIGRATION TOWARD THE WEST, THE  
20101221193631.000|20101221193632.000|CC1|SOUTHWEST, PARTICULARLY TEXAS.
